// Diagram.js
import React,{useState}from"react";import encoder from"plantuml-encoder";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function draw(diagram){return"https://www.plantuml.com/plantuml/svg/"+encoder.encode(diagram);}function Diagram(_ref){let{title,pages}=_ref;const[uml,setUml]=useState('');const[isGen,setGen]=useState(false);const parseJson=()=>{try{setGen(true);}catch(error){console.error('Invalid JSON format',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{rows:"5",cols:"50",value:uml,onChange:e=>setUml(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter Uml here"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:parseJson,children:"Generate UML"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:isGen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:draw(uml),alt:title})})]});}export default Diagram;
